text_block_list.text:
This is the classic year. I'm hoping 
I can get even more out of Gold Ship…!

I was about to speak to her about that 
when wishing her a happy new year but…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: ― Happy new year, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The year has turned over… and with it, 
I have been reborn out of my past self.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
But you know what, I think this is
a miracle. If there was no earth, no
universe…… I wouldn't exist here.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
So I'm going to make this year 
a year to be thankful for everything.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Thank you earth, thank you universe. 
And thank you standing in front of me.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Now, please listen; "Happy New Year 
～From frigid winter into a new spring～"

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: … Thanks so much for listening

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
… Hmm? What is it? 
You got something to tell me too?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
No prob. Come out with it. 
Send that fiery pathos straight at me!
choice_data_list: Let's get some results in the Classics this year!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: … What now? Classics?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I was planning on showing off my 
mad guitar skills this year―

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
But in this day and age, violin 
might be not be a bad choice either.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Sounds cool! Tell me more! 
How do you want me to play? Huh!?

I don't think we're on the 
same page here, but anyway―
choice_data_list: You should build the strength for long events!
We'll figure it out together later.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I see. You mean I'll need stamina to 
keep up long concerts.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That classic stuff has music 
over 10 hours long after all.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Heck yeah…!! 10 hours, 20 hours, 
it don't matter to me, I'll play the 
whole dang thing, no break!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ho hoh, you wanna respect the band 
members's opinions huh? That's great.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Bands often break up because of 
musical differences, you know.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
All right, let's talk the talk out of
it…! Come at me! I'll let this fist do
the talking!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, hey… 
Did you just say… dome tour!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Dream big, is that it! ! 
Oof, the passion… it's burning me!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hooyeah!! 
Time for a jam session, right now!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
We ain't doing this without 
aiming for the top!!!!
